column4: Hey. I've got a question. Does anybody knows how to disable the automuting of speakers feature? Ubuntu mutes my front panel headphones when I plug them
that's funny - usually people want the opposite.  I have no idea though - good luck.
well it's mutting the ONE I am plugging in, and I have to unmute it from the volume control center to hear anything
sorry man - i have no idea (working as designed i believe)
